comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: Egypticus is the researches name for a stone mason who stylistically has been atrributed to a series of medivel churces. Byzantios and the Fabulator are another two fellas who done some impression on the art historians! The Fabulator sounds like a mighty interesting person! /Lars L

comment.author: 61421672@N00
comment._content: Thank you, Lars ! It looks and sounds interesting. I am going to read more tomorrow. I like to search for such details whenever I am, so it's good to know something new, if it's possible :-)
